name: Castle Conquest (AdrianGameDev)
description:
Description

Get ready for a thrilling adventure in Castle Conquest, the action-packed 2D game that will test your skills and keep you on the edge of your seat! As a brave king, you must fight your way through enemy lines, dodging bombs and spikes and using your parkour skills to navigate the treacherous terrain.

Featuring stunning visuals and immersive gameplay, Castle Conquest offers an intense and exciting experience for gamers of all ages. With intuitive controls and a wide variety of enemies and obstacles to overcome, this game will keep you entertained for hours on end.

Whether you're a seasoned gamer or just looking for a fun new challenge, Castle Conquest is the perfect game for you. So what are you waiting for? Join the battle and conquer your enemies to save your kingdom!

Controls

Get ready to unleash your inner king with Castle Conquest! With just a few simple controls, you'll be ready to take on those pesky pigs and reclaim your kingdom. Use A to move left and D to move right, just like a boss.

To jump over obstacles and avoid traps, simply hit the spacebar - it's like being on a pogo stick, but way cooler. And when you need to climb the drapes to reach higher ground, just press W or S and you'll be scaling walls like a pro.

But that's not all! To open chests and uncover treasures, hit E and watch the loot come rolling in. And when it's time to enter the castle, just press W to walk through the door and take on the pigs like a true hero.

So what are you waiting for? Grab your crown and get ready to kick some piggy butt in Castle Conquest!
